lines.text: I'm Bert Banner. You can call me Bert Banner.
Have you two gentlemen ever wondered about the exciting world of male escorts?
Uh... no.

Do you, Zach Morris and Kelly Kapowski, promise to love honor and cherish, in health and sickness, in sickness and death, in death and rigor mortis, and to come back and wander the earth as zombies? Just say I do.
[in a small-town jail cell]
Hi, I'm Herb.
I'm Zack.
What are you fellas in for?
Nothing. It's all a big mistake.
Me too.
What did they get you for?
I went for a drive with my wife. Is that a crime?
Of course not. They arrested you for that? What did your wife say?
Nothing. She was riding in the trunk.
[creeped out, Zack, Slater and Screech back away from Herb]

[to the guys]
And they call me a psycho.
[repeated line]
That's a "no-no".
Best Sports Illustrated swimsuit model?
Elle MacPherson!
